name: babydoll
description: A pink babydoll dress that is just long enough to hide your panties, if you stand still.

name: babydoll nightie
description: A silk pink babydoll nightie, your underwear is clearly visible when wearing this.

name: pacifier
description: A pink pacifier that you can suck on

name: thick diaper
description: A thick diaper worn by adults. It's so thick you are forced to waddle everywhere

name: pullup
description: A pullup with flowers that fade. You can pretend to be a big girl (or boy) for a while.

name: diaper
description: A diaper worn by adults.

name: thick crinkly diaper
description: A thick diaper worn by adults. It's so thick you are forced to waddle everywhere. It crinkles loudly when you move

name: crinkly diaper
description: A diaper worn by adults. It crinkles loudly when you move

name: Diaperfur
description: Your a fursuiter who likes to wear diapers. You hope you get mutated to look like your fursona

name: pair of booties
description: A pair of pink baby booties sized for adults

name: onesie
description: A cute pink onesie

name: leotard
description: A pink unisex leotard dress/tunic

name: Dragon Fur
description: Your entire body is covered in red fur with white fur on your chest, belly, and the bottoms of your hands and feet.

name: Dragon Scales
description: Your entire body is covered in red scales with yellow scales on your chest, belly, and the bottoms of your hands and feet.

name: Smart Thermoregulation
description: Your body's Thermoregulation is a lot smarter than normal, greatly reducing the effects of ambient tempatures

name: plushie
description: A plushie of your favorite animal

name: Furry
description: Thanks to science you're now your fursona (assuming said traits are available)

name: diaperfur kitty
description: A pink humanoid kitty. She is wearing a purple leotard dress and her ultra thick pink diaper is clearly visible. She does a potty dance anytime she needs to use the bathroom but never makes it.

name: diaperfur vixen
description: A sexy diaperfur vixen. She is wearing a red bikini and a thick adult diaper. She can't undo the tapes of her diaper so she does a potty dance while panicking until she pees herself.

name: diaperfur dragoness
description: A sexy red-violet diaperfur dragon. She is wearing a pink lacy halter top and a thick adult diaper. She was never potty trained so she just pees herself like a toddler.

name: giant diapered dragon
description: A giant red dragon wearing a diaper. unlike the diaperfur dragoness, this one isn't a sissy.

name: diaperfur whistle
description: This is a small whistle.  When used, it produces a high tone that causes nearby friendly diaperfurs to either follow you closely and stop attacking, or start attacking enemies if they are currently docile.

name: diuretics
description: The bladder version of a laxative

name: Incontinent
description: You have the bladder control of a newborn. Enjoy :)

name: Debug Bladder
description: You can release anytime you want.

name: Diaperlock
description: Locks for diapers and pants to prevent people from taking them off, forcing them to wet themselves

name: adult footy pajamas
description: Warm and comfy footy pajamas for adults

name: Dragon Wings
description: You have a pair of large, leathery wings. Your body is too heavy to be able to fly, but you can use them to slow your descent during a fall, and will not take falling damage under any circumstances.

name: bladder tablet pc
description: A device that looks sorta like a tablet pc but apparently only has one app called bladder control. in it is a text box and a touch keyboard.

name: pullon diaper
description: A pullup with the thickness of a diaper.

name: pullon diaper w/ velcro
description: A pullup with the thickness of a diaper. Has velcro sides like one too.

name: spiked leather collar with bell
description: A spike studded black leather 'collar' with a bell dangling from the front.  Don't worry, the bell is silent.

name: diaper
description: Adult diapers built to the American standard (In other words it won't last a single use)

name: pullon diaper
description: Breathable pullon diapers that can be worn like regular underwear. It's about as absorbant as regular underwear too.

name: pullon diaper w/ velcro
description: pullon diapers with adjustable straps. Too bad those straps are nearly impossible to undo without ripping the damn thing. You might as well be using Scotch Tape.

name: booster pad
description: Booster pads that you put in your underwear (or diaper to increase its capacity).

name: latex onesie
description: A onesie made from latex, perfect for the kinky AB/DL
//: Pretend latex and leather are the same thing as latex was never added to CDDA and I don't feel like dealing with the complexities of adding latex to the game.

name: Diaper Lover
description: You enjoy wearing and using diapers

name: ever diaper
description: An experimental diaper that can hold infinite urine, you'll never have to change again, as long as you don't mind wearing the same urine saturated diaper for the rest of your life.

name: thick ever diaper
description: An thick experimental diaper that can hold infinite urine, you'll never have to change again, as long as you don't mind wearing the same urine saturated diaper for the rest of your life. It's so thick you are forced to waddle everywhere

name: latex onesie w/ skirt
description: A unisex onesie made from latex, perfect for the kinky AB/DL
//: Pretend latex and leather are the same thing as latex was never added to CDDA and I don't feel like dealing with the complexities of adding latex to the game.

name: adult toddler dress
description: A pink unisex adult toddler dress (men might want to call it a tunic). just short enough to hide a normal pair of underwear, as long as you stand still.

name: thick pink diaper
description: A thick pink frilly diaper worn by adults. It's so thick you are forced to waddle everywhere

name: thick pink ever diaper
description: An thick experimental pink frilly diaper that can hold infinite urine, you'll never have to change again, as long as you don't mind wearing the same urine saturated diaper for the rest of your life. It's so thick you are forced to waddle everywhere

name: adult latex toddler dress
description: A latex unisex adult toddler dress/tunic. It looks like the latex onesie with that skirt, but without the bottom. Your underwear is perfectly visible when wearing this.
//: Pretend latex and leather are the same thing as latex was never added to CDDA and I don't feel like dealing with the complexities of adding latex to the game.

name: pink ever diaper
description: An experimental pink diaper with frills that can hold infinite urine, you'll never have to change again, as long as you don't mind wearing the same urine saturated diaper for the rest of your life.

name: pink diaper
description: A pink diaper with frills worn by adults.

name: onesie w/ skirt
description: A unisex pink onesie with a skirt attached

name: short adult toddler dress
description: A pink unisex adult toddler dress (men might want to call it a tunic). so short at least 50% of your underwear will always show, probably more.

text: This is an advertisement for adult diapers. It has a picture of a female in a diaper. The texts says "Our new adult diapers, for those who are incontinent, AB/DL, or just too lazy to get up."

This is an advertisement for store brand adult diapers from America. It has a picture of people smiling to make it seem better than it really is. The text says "These diapers will hide your embaressing secret about being incontinent. Assuming your bladder holds about 200 ml of urine and you don't need to use it more than once without changing."

This is an advertisement for adult diapers marketed to diaperfurs and babyfurs. It has of a vixen in a thick pink diaper. The texts says "for the best protection that makes Abena jealous. These diapers are more absorbant, thicker, softer, and poofier than anything they ever made."
